articles.title: Anecdotes about President Kim Il Sung
Leaflets praising Kim Jong Il scattered in Pusan
New type processing device developed
articles.content:
Leaflets praising Kim Jong Il scattered in Pusan 
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Leaflets praising leader Kim Jong Il were scattered in eastern district, Pusan, South Korea, early in the morning of Jan. 1, stirring up people, Seoul-based radio voice of national salvation said.
 Written on the front of the leaflet (18 cm x 14 cm) are letters "We wholeheartedly wish the great general Kim Jong Il good health" against the background of his native home in the secret camp on Mt. Paektu. Also written on the reverse are the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and letters "It is a pride of the fellow countrymen and a fortune of the nation to have general Kim Jong Il, the sun of the nation. January 1, Juche 91 (2002). The patriotic fellowship society."    
 The leaflets were distributed among to inhabitants in the district and passers-by in a moment to deeply move them.

Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Buddhist rituals held 
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Buddhist rituals were held at temples in the DPRK yesterday to mark the day of Buddha's attainment of great wisdom.
 Present there were office-bearers of the central committee of the Korean Buddhist Federation and its provincial, city and county committees, chief priests and monks of temples and believers. Speeches were made at the end of the rituals.    
 The speakers expressed their firm determination to conduct a vigorous drive to glorify this year that greets the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as a year of new surge in the building of a powerful nation, holding high the slogan set forth in the joint new year editorial on Jan. 1 and strengthen solidarity with all the Buddhists in the south and abroad and thus decisively smash the moves of the separatists at home and abroad to ditch the June 15 joint declaration and open up an epochal phase of independent national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on benevolent politics
Messages of greetings exchanged
First board meeting of Pyongyang-Euro-Asia Joint Venture Company
articles.content:
Messages of greetings exchanged 
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Messages of greetings were exchanged between Paek Nam Sun and Ismail Cem, foreign ministers of the DPRK and Turkey, on the occasion of the first anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
 Paek said that the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries deepened the trust between the two peoples and created favorable conditions to develop bilateral relations in various fields.    
 Cem expressed the hope that the relations between the two countries would develop in the fields of mutual concern.

articles.content:
First board meeting of Pyongyang-Euro-Asia Joint Venture Company
    Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The first meeting of the board of the Pyongyang-Euro-Asia Joint Venture Company was held at the People's Palace of Culture today.
 Present there were bin yang, president of the Holland Euro-Asia Group who is also director general of the board of the company, Kim Tong Gyu, president of the Pyongyang horticulture group who is vice-director general of the board, members of the board and officials concerned.    
 The meeting discussed a series of issues concerning the operation of the company and the construction of green house of vegetables and flowers.
